titleStmt.title: The most excellent and plesant metaphoricall historie of Pesistratus and Catanea. Set forth this present yeare by Edm. Eluiden Gentleman
titleStmt.author: Elviden, Edmund, poet.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The historie of Pesistratus & Catanea.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
